channel.title: Get Through This - Art of Dying
channel.description:
Anyone ever heard the song before? First time I heard it was on the radio, and I actually thought it was pretty emo (don't ask). Then i went home, and watched the youtube video, and later discovered that the song was about going through cancer. I find it's not only a song with a good message to it, but it is just a good thing to listen to. For all of you 'screamo' fans you probably won't like this, however it is rock.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qKn4TloBZg

item.title: Get Through This - Art of Dying
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Every time I hear the song, I think of Lee Kizer. I remember watching the Amateurs on Television and then his story. Sad his life had to end.

Read full topic

item.title: Get Through This - Art of Dying
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I think the singer sound horrible, like taken from backstreet boys or something similar. Lyrics aren’t deep enough, they sound like written by a teenager.

For the record: Screamo is emo and sucks.

Read full topic
